summary: Hayagriva-llm is a CLI tool that generates structured LLM metadata files (llm.package.json and llm.package.txt) for Node.js packages. It analyzes package manifests and source code to create comprehensive AI-readable descriptions of package functionality, helping AI systems better understand and interact with npm packages. The tool integrates seamlessly with existing package.json workflows and supports TypeScript analysis for accurate type information.
whenToUse: Use Hayagriva-llm when you want to make your Node.js package more discoverable and understandable by AI systems. It's particularly valuable for package authors who want their libraries to be properly interpreted by AI assistants, documentation generators, or automated code analysis tools. Choose this package when you need to generate standardized metadata that describes your package's functionality in a structured format that AI systems can parse and utilize.
